title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Computers in clinical medicine and practice. Informatics and its relevance to medicine, cybernetics and virtual reality. Applications of internet technology and world-wide web in health care delivery, development and spread. Introduction to data base and knowledge based system. ER models, relational data model and query languages. Storage, retrieval and management of medical information â patient medical history, records of physical and systematic examinations and investigations including signs and systems, tests â laboratory and pathology, diagnosis and treatment. Decision support systems in medicine â soft computing techniques in medicine. Interactive applications and medical information system. Integrated Hospital Information system. Computer aided learning and education for medical and paramedical professionals.
